resources.string: Take a look at "Malaysia Prayer Times"
Alhamdullilah. Thank you for your interest in donating towards Malaysia Prayer Times.
You can help MPT by spreading the word! Share your experience in using MPT with your friends!
MPT is now open sourced on GitHub and hosted on DigitalOcean. \n\nIf you are a developer you can improve MPT codes. You can create a DigitalOcean account with the referral link and get $10 credit.
If you would like to further support MPT\'s development, you can donate to Noorzaini Ilhami. \n\nMPT will always remain as a free app with no advertisements.
Oops! Have you enabled your location settings?
Allow MPT to retrieve your location.
Uhoh! We need to know your current location to show the mosque list!
Uhoh! We need to know your current location to show the prayer times!
Oops! Have you checked your internet connection?
Uhoh! There is something wrong with Play Services!
Uhoh! There is something wrong with the prayer data provider!
Oops! There might be something wrong with the server!
Uhoh! We are unable to recognize your location!
Uhoh! We are not expecting this error!
Uhoh! We do not support your current location yet!
